title: Záložky v novém panelu
content:
Zdravím, potřeboval bych, aby se Záložky otevíraly defaultně v novém panelu. Nyní je dafaultní nastavení je Otevřít, což způsobí otevření v aktuálním panelu. A ano vím, že to lze pravou myší :)

Díky za radu. Pavel
creator: PasaH

title: Migration to ESR 115.1 from 115.0.2
content: I am currently running Firefox on High Sierra 10.13.6 and have been advised that that OS will soon no longer be supported. I did have an option to do an update to ESR 115.1 in my Firefox app, however I was not home for a few days and when I returned planning to do the update it was no longer available. Now it just says my Firefox is up to date with 115.0.2... how can I get the update to the ESR 115.1? Thanks!
creator: dkoke

title: Private browsing NOT private - ALL logins / information still active and saved after closing and reopening private window
content:
How can this be allowed to happen? This goes against everything private browsing is supposed to be.

I open a private window' log in to gmail, reddit, amazon, any site, etc; i close private browsing window entirely - removed from taskbar; i reopen private browsing and all my sessions are still signed in.

The fact that this is happening is negligent to the point of criminality. WHAT is the solution and why is this being allowed to occur?
creator: sardonicpillow

what can i do for this purpose?

title: Bookmarks
content: I have Firefox on my windows computer with a bunch of bookmarks and saved passwords, I downloaded Firefox onto my iPhone and cannot access or find any of my saved bookmarks or passwords. How can I sync both my computer and iPhone?

title: can't figure out how to add a paper size
content:
Hello,

I'm using Firefox on my mac and have spent the last 2 hours just trying to figure out how to add a custom paper size. I need to print 2.25" x 1.25" labels on a Dymo printer. But there is nowhere to add a paper size and only 5 paper size options.

How do I simply add a paper size?
creator: janine.hamilton

title: Saved Passwords/logins keep dropping out
content: Team, I love FF, I really do and i want to make FF my default browser and move away from Chrome, but I keep loosing my saved login credentials and have to constantly refresh FF by threatening to remove it from Control Panel, it then asks me to try a refresh and yippee problem solved. However, I can't keep doing this daily, it's killing me. is there something i'm missing here? P
